title: Mondadori logo serif
content:
The M particularly is throwing me off in identifying this font. Any thoughts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131031211509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/new_logo_ame_home_3697.gif)
 - sorry it's so small, that's how it is on their website.

Thanks in advance.
author: vivicity

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131031211509im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_Mondadori_4855.jpg)

I think it's custom. And surely pre-digital.

What Riccardo said. If you’re looking for alternatives, [the small caps of FF Acanthus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131031211509/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_acanthus_text_bold_caps/?&sample_text=mondadori&sample_size=74&update=0) are similar in proportion.

Thanks Riccardo - Danke Florian.  
May have to create a good M.
